description:
HBO had another big night as 'Game of Thrones' and 'Veep' won best drama and comedy again. Meanwhile, 6-time nominee Sarah Paulson finally took home best actress for 'American Crime Story: The People vs. O.J.Simpson.《权力的游戏》和《副总统》又一次赢得了剧情类和喜剧类最佳剧集，HBO今晚又是一次大丰收了。与此同时，6次被提名的沙拉·保罗森也终于凭借《美国犯罪故事》斩获最佳女主，。

The 68th annual Primetime Emmy Awards took place in downtown Los Angeles on Sunday night.第68届黄金时段艾美奖于周日晚在洛杉矶市中心拉开帷幕。

Jimmy Kimmel hosted the ceremony. HBO's Game of Thrones led all nominees with 23 nods, while American Crime Story: The People vs. O.J.Simpson earned an impressive 22 nominations its breakout year.吉米·柯美尔主持了盛典。HBO的《权力的游戏》斩获23项提名，而《美国犯罪故事》以印象深刻的22项提名成为今年的大黑马。

The following is a partial list of Emmy nominations for this year:以下是2016年艾美奖提名的获奖名单：

Outstanding Drama Series剧情类最佳剧集

"Better Call Saul"《风骚律师》

"Downton Abbey"《唐顿庄园》

"Game Of Thrones"《权力的游戏》

组队刷美剧：《权力的游戏》知识点详解看这里！>>>

"Homeland" 《国土安全》

"House Of Cards"《纸牌屋》

组队刷美剧：《纸牌屋》知识点详解看这里！>>>

"Mr. Robot" 《黑客军团》

Outstanding Comedy Series喜剧类最佳剧集

"Modern Family"《摩登家庭》
